content: Hi @Saul Kravitz , Does DaVinci allow for separating different lines of business (ie Medicaid, Medicare) or products (Medical v. Pharmacy) into separate sets of APIs? I don't see any restriction in the rules and because business is done very differently, we are considering. Thanks, Kristin
@Robert Dieterle @Gail Kocher

This is not a Da Vinci issue -- the IG will support any number of APIs -- the response from CMS to the question we posed regarding multiple APIs is on the main Da Vinci confluence page -- to paraphrase -- CMS rule does not specify the number of Patient Access APIs that a payer may use to provide access to the required information.
